<strong>Who are you?</strong>  
A modest host with a growing number of clients from LET and elsewhere. My name is Matt and <del>I was lured to LET by @severian a couple years ago and have not been able to escape yet</del> I've been selling vps and shared hosting in one form or another since 2013 and 2003 respectively.

<strong>What do you mean by 'unmanaged'?</strong>  
I mean vps/containers aren't entered into without your consent and support isn't provided re: software errors/configuration/bugs/etc. At the same time there are multiple techs standing by and I'm often willing to attempt 'best effort' support.

<strong>Node specs?</strong>  
A mixture of E5-1620, E5-1650, X3470 & E3-1230 processors with SATA HDD. RAID 1 in MTL, no RAID in LV.

<strong>DDoS protection?</strong>  
OVH's <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/">anti-DDoS mitigation</a> in MTL and basic protection (10Gbps / 2Mpps) in LV.

<strong>Unmetered?</strong>  
It's a shared 500Mbps port (burstable to 1Gbps). No overage fees, but your vps will be suspended upon reaching its limit. 9Mbps = ~2958GB / month.

<strong>9 Mbps max?</strong>  
Upgrades are available for the following one-time fees:  
10Mbps - $1  
20Mbps - $2  
30Mbps - $3  
40Mbps - $4  
50Mbps - $5  
60Mbps - $6  
70Mbps - $7  
80Mbps - $8  
90Mbps - $9  
100Mbps - $10

<strong>Unmetered in LV?</strong>  
No, it's 222GB, 333GB, 444GB, etc. Contact support if you need more bandwidth (free upgrades may appear).

<strong>Backups?</strong>  
$1 one-time fee for daily backups.

<strong>Extra IPv4?</strong>  
$9 / IP / year.

<strong>Can I pay monthly?</strong>  
Yep, it's $3.33 per month for every plan.

<strong>Is X allowed?</strong>  
See the <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/">Terms</a>.
